DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate MEDI6383 give alone together MEDI4736 adult subject recurrent metastatic solid tumor .
DOC.brief_title: A Phase 1 Study Evaluate MEDI6383 Alone Combination With MEDI4736 Adult Subjects With Select Advanced Solid Tumors
DOC.detailed_description: This Phase 1 , multicenter , open-label , dose-escalation , dose-expansion study evaluate safety , tolerability , pharmacokinetics , immunogenicity , pharmacodynamics , antitumor activity MEDI6383 alone combination MEDI4736 adult subject recurrent metastatic solid tumor .
